The claim is debunked by Scott Davis, executive director of the North Dakota Indian Affairs Commission, who states that the idea of forcing a Covid-19 vaccine on Native American tribes is false and that the tribes will have their own processes and review boards to determine if the vaccine is suitable for their communities.
